description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Book of Ser Marco Polo, the Venetian, concerning the kingdoms and marvels of the East. Newly translated and edited, with notes, by H. Yule, ... With maps and other illustrations.]", "English" Author: POLO, Marco. Contributor: YULE, Henry - Sir, K.C.S.I Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010026.i.17." Volume: 02 Page: 501 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1875 Edition: Second edition, revised. With the addition of new matter and many new illustrations. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002951296 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
